root.name: SSIM toolbox
root.description:
The SSIM is an index measuring the structural similarity between two images. It is valued between -1 and 1. When two images are nearly identical, their SSIM is close to 1.
SSIM reference: Z. Wang, A. C. Bovik, H. R. Sheikh, E. P. Simoncelli (2004), Image quality assessment: from error visibility to structural similarity, IEEE Transactions on Image Processing, 13(4), 600-612.
